name: Wumpus (TRS-80 Color Computer)
description: This is yet another implementation of the TI-99 game, this time for the 64K TRS-80  Color Computer 2.  This game was released as a physical cartridge but you can purchase an archive here containing a .bin file, a .dsk file, and the game's source code.  The archive also includes the sprite editor I created to make the games graphics.
